languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Ее Светлость Теодора высоко ценила свои связи с Адептус Арбитес. Боюсь, если отказать проктору в аудиенции, второго шанса наладить взаимодействие с ними не представится".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, Ее Светлость Теодора высоко ценила свои связи с Адептус Арбитес. Боюсь, если отказать проктору в аудиенции, второго шанса наладить взаимодействие с ними не представится".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Ее Светлость Теодора высоко ценила свои связи с Адептус Арбитес. Боюсь, если отказать проктору в аудиенции, второго шанса наладить взаимодействие с ними не представится".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to establish cooperation with them."

"Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to establish cooperation with them."

"Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

"Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

"Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

"Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, lady Theodora tenía en gran estima sus conexiones con el Adeptus Arbites. Temo que, si rechazamos la solicitud de audiencia del Procurador, no recibiremos otra oportunidad de cooperar con ellos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, lady Theodora tenía en gran estima sus conexiones con el Adeptus Arbites. Temo que, si rechazamos la solicitud de audiencia del Procurador, no recibiremos otra oportunidad de cooperar con ellos».

languages.text: “舰长大人，西奥多拉夫人生前非常注重与法务部之间的合作。如果您拒绝了监察官的请求，我们恐怕就不会再有机会和他们合作了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，西奥多拉夫人生前非常注重与法务部之间的合作。如果您拒绝了监察官的请求，我们恐怕就不会再有机会和他们合作了。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, dame Théodora attachait beaucoup d'importance à ses contacts au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites. Si nous refusons d'accéder à la demande du proctor, j'ai bien peur que nous n'ayons pas d'autres occasions de renouveler notre partenariat avec eux. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, dame Théodora attachait beaucoup d'importance à ses contacts au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites. Si nous refusons d'accéder à la demande du proctor, j'ai bien peur que nous n'ayons pas d'autres occasions de renouveler notre partenariat avec eux. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、レディ・シオドーラはアデプトゥス・アルビテスとのつながりを非常に重要視していました。もし、私たちが代理人の支持の要請を断れば、彼らとの協力関係を構築する機会などもうないのではないかという恐れがあります」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、レディ・シオドーラはアデプトゥス・アルビテスとのつながりを非常に重要視していました。もし、私たちが代理人の支持の要請を断れば、彼らとの協力関係を構築する機会などもうないのではないかという恐れがあります」

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora, Adeptus Arbites ile olan bağlantılarına çok değer verirdi Lord Kaptan. Korkarım Üsteğmen'in görüşme talebini reddedersek onlarla iş birliği yapmak için başka bir fırsat elimize geçmeyebilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora, Adeptus Arbites ile olan bağlantılarına çok değer verirdi Lord Kaptan. Korkarım Üsteğmen'in görüşme talebini reddedersek onlarla iş birliği yapmak için başka bir fırsat elimize geçmeyebilir."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora waren ihre Verbindungen zum Adeptus Arbites sehr wichtig. Ich fürchte, wenn wir dem Proktor eine Audienz verweigern, verspielen wir unsere einzige Chance auf eine Zusammenarbeit."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora valued her connections to the Adeptus Arbites greatly. I fear that if we deny the Proctor's request for an audience, there may not be another chance to build cooperation with them."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Theodora waren ihre Verbindungen zum Adeptus Arbites sehr wichtig. Ich fürchte, wenn wir dem Proktor eine Audienz verweigern, verspielen wir unsere einzige Chance auf eine Zusammenarbeit."
